scripts.build: composer install --no-dev && npm install && npm run archive
scripts.postarchive: npm run archive:cleanup && rm -rf $npm_package_name && unzip $npm_package_name.zip -d $npm_package_name && rm $npm_package_name.zip && zip -r $npm_package_name.zip $npm_package_name && rm -rf $npm_package_name
scripts.archive:cleanup: zip -d $npm_package_name.zip \*.idea/\* .wp-env.json CLAUDE.md CHANGELOG.md .claude/\* .playwright-mcp/\* bin/\* wordpress/\* playwright-report/\* tmp/\* wordpress_org_assets/\* test-results/\* fonts/\* themes/\* plugins/\* tests/\* .github/\* wordpress_org_assets/\* \*.DS_Store \*README.md \*.gitignore \*composer.json \*composer.lock phpunit.xml.dist .phpunit.result.cache playwright.config.js \*package.json \*package-lock.json
scripts.tests:e2e: wp-env clean tests && npx playwright test
